result.eng: I promise you that it will be done.
result.ga: geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déanta
result.orig: geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déanta
result.html: geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déantaI promise you that it will be done.
result.ponchtml: geallaim duit go mbeiḋ sé déantaI promise you that it will be done.

result.eng: I can't promise anything but I'll do my best.
result.ga: ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a bith a thabhairt ach déanfaidh mé mo dhícheall
result.orig: ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a bith a thabhairt ach déanfaidh mé mo dhícheall
result.html: ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a bith a thabhairt ach déanfaidh mé mo dhícheallI can't promise anything but I'll do my best.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a biṫ a ṫaḃairt aċ déanfaiḋ mé mo ḋíċeallI can't promise anything but I'll do my best.

result.eng: He gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ga: thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.orig: thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.html: thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ponchtml: ṫug sé geall dom go dtiocfaiḋ sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
result.ponchtml: ṫug 'aċ aon duine acu láṁ is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
